00059 #define AA_MAX(a,b) \
00060     ({ const typeof(a) aa_$_max_a = (a); \
00061        const typeof(b) aa_$_max_b = (b); \
00062        (aa_$_max_a > aa_$_max_b) ? aa_$_max_a : aa_$_max_b; })
00063 
00065 #define AA_MIN(a,b) \
00066     ({ const typeof(a) aa_$_min_a = (a); \
00067        const typeof(b) aa_$_min_b = (b); \
00068        (aa_$_min_a < aa_$_min_b) ? aa_$_min_a : aa_$_min_b; })
00069 
00071 AA_DEPRECATED static inline double aa_clamp( double val, double level) {
00072     if( val > level )  return level;
00073     if( val < -level ) return -level;
00074     return val;
00075 }
00076 
00078 static inline double aa_fclamp( double val, double min, double max) {
00079     if( val > max )  return max;
00080     if( val < min ) return min;
00081     return val;
00082 }
00083 
00085 static inline void aa_vclamp( size_t n, double *v, double min, double max) {
00086     for( size_t i = 0; i < n; i++ ) {
00087         if( v[i] > max )  v[i] = max;
00088         else if( v[i] < min ) v[i] = min;
00089     }
00090 }
00091 
00092 
00094 static inline double aa_sign( double val ) {
00095     if( val > 0 )  return 1;
00096     if( val < 0 ) return -1;
00097     return 0;
00098 }

00104 static inline int aa_feq( double a, double b, double tol ) {
00105     return fabs(a-b) <= tol;
00106 }

00113 static inline double aa_fsq( double a ) {
00114     return a * a;
00115 }

00118 #define AA_MODULO(a,b) (((a) % (b)) + (b)) % (b);
00119 
00121 static inline int aa_imodulo( int a, int b ) {
00122     //return ((a % b) + b) % b;
00123     return AA_MODULO(a,b);
00124 }
00125 
00127 static inline long aa_lmodulo( long a, long b ) {
00128     return AA_MODULO(a,b);
00129 }
00130 
00132 static inline int64_t aa_imodulo64( int64_t a, int64_t b ) {
00133     return AA_MODULO(a,b);
00134 }
00135 
00137 static inline int aa_iremainder( int a, int b ) {
00138     return a % b;
00139 }
00140 
00142 static inline double aa_fmodulo( double a, double b ) {
00143     return fmod(fmod(a, b) + b,  b);
00144 }
00145 
00147 static inline double aa_fremainder( double a, double b ) {
00148     return fmod(a , b);
00149 }

00179 static inline double aa_stat_z2x(double z, double mu, double sigma) {
00180     return (z * sigma) + mu;
00181 }
00182 
00185 static inline double aa_stat_x2z(double x, double mu, double sigma) {
00186     return (x-mu)/sigma;
00187 }

00269 static inline double aa_ang_rad2deg( double rad ) {
00270     return rad*180.0/M_PI;
00271 }
00272 
00274 static inline double aa_ang_deg2rad( double deg ) {
00275     return deg*M_PI/180;
00276 }
00277 
00278 
00280 static inline double aa_ang_norm_2pi( double an ) {
00281     return aa_fmodulo( an, 2*M_PI );
00282 }
00283 
00285 static inline double aa_ang_norm_pi( double an ) {
00286     //return aa_fmodulo( an + M_PI, 2*M_PI ) - M_PI;
00287     return remainder( an, 2*M_PI );
00288 }
00289 
00290 
00292 static inline double aa_ang_delta( double a, double b) {
00293     return aa_ang_norm_pi( aa_ang_norm_pi(a) - aa_ang_norm_pi(b) );
00294 }

00437 static inline void
00438 aa_la_diag( size_t n, double *A, double x ) {
00439     for( size_t i = 0; i < n; i ++ )
00440         A[i*n+i] = x;
00441 }
00442 
00444 static inline void
00445 aa_la_ident( size_t n, double *A ) {
00446     aa_fset(A, 0, n*n);
00447     aa_la_diag(n,A,1.0);
00448 }
00449 
00451 static inline void
00452 aa_la_mvmul( size_t m, size_t n, const double *A, const double *x, double *b ) {
00453     cblas_dgemv( CblasColMajor, CblasNoTrans, (int)m, (int)n,
00454                  1.0, A, (int)m,
00455                  x, 1, 0, b, 1 );
00456 }
